commit message:
Shortened message 'Data disabled, next sync at ' to 'Next sync at ', for
benefit of smaller screens

disabled BatteryMinder for KitKat+, since KitKat no longer allows apps
to get BATTERY_STATS permission
added forcing of mobile data on when going into 'online' mode.
added null check for wakelock stats

- assded asynctask to data toggling to avoid lag on older devices
- bug fix: travel mode now always disables data.
async task for swutching data off
fixed missing space from otification message

Changed AsyncTask to Thread, for some reason AsyncTask wasn't running.
Also added API compatability for airplane mode checking
